page.syntax: $u.s.word(str as string, wordNumber as number [, separator as string])

argument.name: wordNumber
argument.description: A number indicating which word to extract from the string.

argument.name: separator
argument.description: (Optional) Default value is a space. Specify the word separator that marks word boundaries.

description.p: Fetch a given word from a string, based on a separator (the default separator is a space).
